headline: LEYBOLD ROTARY VANE MECHANICAL VACUUM PUMP 4.5 CFM
description: Two Stage Mechanical Vacuum Pump     Once sold, all mechanical vacuum pumps will be rebuilt to factory specifications, unless stated otherwise. All rebuilt pumps are sold with a one year warranty on parts and labor. Pumps can be ordered Fomblin® or standard hydrocarbon oil prepped.  Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Leybold
Model D4A
Pumping Speed 4.5 CFM (127.2 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 3.00E-4(En) torr (4.00E-4 mbar)
Inlet Flange KF 16.0 mm (0.630 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 16.0 mm (0.630 in)
Refurbished YES
Two-Stage YES
Gas Ballast Yes
Direct Drive Yes
Motor Horsepower 1/3 HP
Rotational Speed 1,725 RPM
Oil Capacity Minimum: 0.71 L (0.75 qt, 0.16 Br gal)
Power Requirements 115/ 230 V 7.0 A 60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 7.000 in (17.8 cm)
Depth 20.000 in (50.8 cm)
Height 10.000 in (25.4 cm)
Weight 45 lb (20 kg)
